content: - by switching the yarn and hook size you can make earrings and/or ornaments size 10 crochet thread and a 1 5mm hook #3 light weight yarn and a h hook - a stitch count has been provided at the end of each round - blocking isn t necessary but advised - 25 yards of 100% worsted weight cotton yarn - i/5 50mm crochet hook - scissors - measuring tape - yarn needle - blocking materials - for ornament ornament hook - for earrings earring findings i can not offer any refunds on patterns due to it being a pdf download you may sell finished items made with my pattern i just ask that you credit the design to crochets by trista
